ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds sweet or hot Italian sausage, in the casing
2 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto ham, minced
2 medium carrots, peeled and in medium dice
2 medium celery stalks, in medium dice
3 (15.8 ounce) cans great Northern or other white beans, undrained

cookingTips: Brown sausage in its casing first, then slice for deeper flavor, or remove casing and crumble for faster cooking
Build flavors by sautéing the mirepoix (onions, carrots, celery) before adding remaining ingredients
Simmer for 20-30 minutes to allow flavors to meld; don't overcook or beans may break down
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through building layers of flavor with a proper mirepoix, browning sausage, and simmering the soup perfectly.
